name: i have 2 gunz #GeoJam 2021
description:
I made this game in 7 days for #GeoJam 2021What is this game?

This is a simple endless game. Ending when you die.

If you have red gun, you can kill red enemies with 1 shot.

But for killing blue enemies with red gun, you must shoot 2 times.

You should switch guns.

Same for blue gun too.

ControlsW - Move UpS - Move DownA - Move LeftD - Move RightLeft Mouse Button - ShootSpace Key - Switch Guns
